@@ -215,7 +215,7 @@ Agents like Orchestrator and Requirement Gatherer now subclass `AgentGraph` and
 
 ## 7. Development Workflow & Tools (from `README.md` & `project_memories/PRD.md`)
 
-*   (No significant changes to the overall workflow mentioned in PR, Makefile targets for specific agent tests might be affected if agent names/structures change significantly, but core `make` commands remain.)
+*   **Project Memory Update Script:** The script `scripts/update_project_memory_from_pr.sh`, responsible for incorporating PR details into the project memory (this document), had its LLM call configuration (`generationConfig`) modified. The parameters were set to `temperature: 0.1` (previously 0.2), `topK: 20` (previously 40), and `topP: 0.90` (previously 0.95) to reduce randomness and improve consistency in automated memory updates.
 *   **Ruff Linting:** `pyproject.toml` updated with per-file ignores for `T201` (print statements) in `src/orchestrator/{graph,test}.py` and `src/requirement_gatherer/graph.py` and `src/requirement_gatherer/tools.py`.

 │   └── global.md
 ├── pyproject.toml                # UPDATED: Ruff per-file ignores
 ├── scripts/
-│   └── generate_project_memory.sh
+│   ├── generate_project_memory.sh
+│   └── update_project_memory_from_pr.sh # UPDATED: LLM params for memory generation
 ├── src/
 │   ├── agent_template/
